Description of incident: "Federal prosecutors have charged the owner of a Chinese aviation firm with trying to steal data  about U.S. military aircraft by hacking into the computer networks of Lockheed Martin and other U.S. companies, according to a federal complaint  unsealed in Los Angeles this week".Allegedly, the Chinese hackers stole information  about Lockheed’s F-22 and F-35 fighter jets.  Large amount of data were stolen on a dozen U.S military projects.
